name: Metalborn

abilities.name: Metal Form
Metallic Body
abilities.effect:
Your metallic form grants you the following benefits:
* Replace [_Natural_] with [_Metal_] on all your effects.
* Gain +2 _Block_ against _Slash_, _Stab_, and _Crush_ effects.

abilities.name: Metallic Reconstitution
abilities.effect: As a part of a _Rest Roll_, if you are in a _Place of Power_ or consume a _Minor Source_ (_Metal_) automatically gain a single _Efficacy_ stake for the _Rest Roll_ that you must use on yourself. Whenever you would clear _Fatigue_ or mark a segment on a _Wound Clock_ you may instead restore _Durability_ to your _Armor_ (if relevant), even if destroyed.

abilities.name: Heat Conduction
abilities.effect:
This creature has three states: Heated, Normal, and Chilled.
* While _Heated_, the creature has _Weakness_ to _Cold_ and _Water_, and adds _Fire_ to all _Martial_ _Attacks_.
* While _Chilled_, the creature has _Weakness_ to _Fire_, and adds _Cold_ to all _Martial_ _Attacks_.
* Whenever the creature takes _Fire_ Damage, move them one step towards Heated. 
* Whenever they take _Cold_ Damage, move them one step towards Chilled.
* Whenever they take _Water_ Damage, move them one step towards Chilled but not beyond Normal.

abilities.name: Metallic Resonance
abilities.special: Your Spirit may use this on your _Turn_ while not _Summoned_. If they do, they must Target _Equipment_ you have _Worn_ or _Packed_.
abilities.effect: Clear 4 _Stun_.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Healing
enhancements.effect: Instead, clear 4 _Stun_ and gain 3 _Stamina_. If triggering this based on _Equipment_, reduce the _Durability_ of said _Equipment_ by 1.

desc: You're a spirit of metal, cold and unyielding.

name: Woodborn

abilities.name: Wooden Form
Wooden Body
abilities.effect:
Your wooden form grants you the following effects:
* Replace [_Natural_] with [_Wood_] on all your effects.
* Gain +2 _Block_ against _Stab_ and _Crush_ effects.
* Gain _Weakness_ to _Fire_.

abilities.name: Wooden Reconstitution
abilities.effect: As a part of a _Rest Roll_ if you are in a _Place of Power_ or consume a _Minor Source_ (_Wood_) of high-quality Wood automatically gain a single _Efficacy_ stake for the _Rest Roll_ that you must use on yourself. Whenever you would clear _Fatigue_ or mark a segment on a _Wound Clock_ you may instead restore _Durability_ to your _Armor_ (if relevant), even if destroyed.

abilities.name: Wooden Resonance
abilities.special: Your Spirit may use this on your _Turn_ while not _Summoned_. If they do, they must Target _Equipment_ you have _Worn_ or _Packed_.
abilities.effect: Clear 4 _Stun_.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Healing
enhancements.effect: Instead, clear 4 _Stun_ and gain 3 _Stamina_. If triggering this based on _Equipment_, reduce the _Durability_ of said _Equipment_ by 1.

desc: You're a spirit of wood, adaptable and ever-growing.

name: Light Natural Armor
prereqs: Metal, Earth, Wood, or Ice Spirit, and no other [Armored] Traits.

abilities.name: Carapace Armor
abilities.effect: This spirit gains the _Carapace_ Armor.

desc: You have scales, a thin shell, or some other natural defense mechanism.

name: Sure-Footed

abilities.name: Perfect Footing
Confident Mobility
abilities.effect: Once per _Round_ you may ignore any increased _Movement_ cost or penalties to _Reflex_ due to _Terrain_ at no cost. You may refresh this ability for 1 _Momentum_ at any point. Finally, gain +1 _Reflex_.

desc: You have an impeccable sense of balance, allowing you to move safely and confidently through anything.

name: Flowering

abilities.name: Fruiting
abilities.effect: While traveling, you may take 1 _Stress_ to create 1 _Food_ (Basic) as some of the flowers bloom into small fruit.

abilities.name: Sprouting
abilities.effect: Your spirit may be treated as a source of _Least_ or _Minor Source_ (_Wood_) that can be removed without harming them as they spontaneously sprout branches and other growths. Additionally, you may always target within their _Engagement_ as if it was _Fertile_ and is a _Source_ (_Plant_).

desc: You're covered in small, flowering growths that can be encouraged to grow at a moment's notice.

name: Metallic Threads

abilities.name: Threads
Wire Whip
abilities.effect: Attack a Target within _Range_. You may deal no Damage to reduce the cost of <u>Entangle</u> by 1, but must choose prior to making the Attack.

enhancements.name: Entangle
enhancements.effect: Add _Entangled_ 1 [_Reflex_] on a _Graze_+, or _Entangled_ 2 [_Reflex_] on a _Crit_.

abilities.name: Web Trap
abilities.effect: Create a _Metallic Web_ in _Range_ 0, which is treated as a _Minor Source_ (_Metal_). When a creature becomes _Engaged_ with _Metallic Web_ they must _Negate_ [_Reflex_ 7] or gain _Entangled_ 1; this is also inflicted if the _Metallic Web_ is used as a _Missile_. You are immune to all _Metallic Webs_ you create. You may use this once on your _Turn_ regardless of _Stance_ after completing all the Stance's actions.

desc: You can emit thin metallic threads, allowing you to move similar to a spider.

name: Locust Biology

abilities.name: Locust Biology
abilities.effect: You have _Resistance_ [_Poison_].

desc: Locusts are near-impervious to poison due to their heavy reliance on it.

name: Piercing Horns

abilities.name: Horned Wrath
abilities.effect: Your powerful horns or antlers are mighty weapons, especially when you have room to maneuver. Once per Skill Challenge, if you have room to maneuver, gain an automatic _Efficacy_ stake when your horns would aid in battle.

abilities.name: Horns
abilities.desc: A natural weapon suitable for sharp horns, antlers, and similar growths.
abilities.effect: Attack a Target within Range. If you became _Engaged_ with the Target this _Turn_, deal +1 Damage, even on a _Miss_.

enhancements.name: Driving Ram
enhancements.effect: Add _Push_. If you successfully _Push_ you may _Move_ with the Target, paying only increased costs due to _Terrain_ and _Status_. Do not create any _Openings_ if you do so. You may select this and another _Enhancement_.

enhancements.name: Head Down
enhancements.effect: You put your head down and charge with reckless abandon. Deal +_1/2/2/3_ Damage Damage. If you Miss, gain 4 _Stun_ and _Exposed_. If you _Graze_, instead gain 2 _Stun_. You must choose this _Enhancement_ prior to making the Attack.

desc: You have sharp horns that can pierce deep into foes.

name: Climber

abilities.name: Natural Climber
Climbing
abilities.effect: This creature can bypass many features (such as _Cliffs_) when moving between _Arenas_.

desc: You're a natural climber, allowing you to easily scale even the most sheer of surfaces.

abilities.name: Speedy
Improved Mobility
abilities.effect: Gain +1 _Movement_.

abilities.name: Sprint
abilities.triger: None. You may use this Reaction at any time, but only once per Round.
abilities.effect: Immediately gain 2 _Movement_ and 1 Fatigue.

abilities.name: Swiftness
Agility
abilities.effect: Gain +1 _Movement_ and +1 _Reflex_.

abilities.name: Scamper
abilities.effect: At the start of your _Turn_, before any using any other abilities, you may _Retreat_, regardless of what your _Stance_ dictates.

abilities.name: Tiny Size
Diminutive Agility
abilities.effect: Your Spirit becomes _Tiny_, decreases their _Speed_ by 1, gains a +1 to _Reflex_, and +1 _Movement_. If they already have _Speed_ 1, instead gain an additional +1 _Movement_. You may _Manifest_ your Spirit from a _Least Source_.

abilities.name: Small Size
Small Profile
abilities.effect: Your Spirit becomes _Small_, gains +2 _Stamina_, +1 _Stun_, and +1 _Reflex_. You may _Manifest_ your Spirit from a _Minor Source_.

abilities.name: Medium Size
Medium Profile
abilities.effect: Your Spirit becomes _Medium_, gains +5 _Stamina_, +3 _Stun_, and +1 _Grit_. You may _Manifest_ your Spirit from a _Moderate Source_.

abilities.name: Large Size
Large Profile
abilities.effect: Your Spirit becomes _Large_, gains +10 _Stamina_, +6 _Stun_, and +2 _Grit_. You may _Manifest_ your Spirit from a _Major Source_.
